body:
ConvertTo-Html is awesome but it will be better to add some parameter 

```
-coloneName: colone to perform action in -condition 
-condition: {action} "css"
-action: effect row or cell
```

for example: display property status and name, if colone status is 'running' then background green, if is stopped then background red and foreground in white, and this action in entire row

```
get-service | ConvertTo-Html -Property status,name  -coloneName status -condition  {
  {$_ -eq 'running'} "background:green"
  {$_ -eq 'stopped'} "background:red; color:white"
}} -action row
```
title: add new parameters to ConvertTo-Html
